name: Roombattle (EauDouce)
description:
Our submission for the ScoreSpace jam #20 with the theme "Absorb". Roombattle is a game where robot vacuum cleaners chase you (a robot vacuum too (but you lack any weaponry) ). 

To get the highest score possible, you must survive the longest time possible and absorb the most radioactive dust spots you can. While you play, your battery slowly drains; you must collect batteries to replenish it. If an enemy touches your vacuum cleaner, its battery is lowered.

Inspired by this William Osman video : 

Made by efi, jusoue, Overlord, Quarton, Ramou and Taluuuu

A big thanks to Quarton's father for the awesome music!
